title: Bronze Borders
body: can we get bronze borders so i can show off my wood/unranked borders with pride?

replies.body:
yea, but i dont want to be grouped up with those bronzies, i want something to distinguish myself from them

i just feel dirty y'know?

im perfectly happy in wood division, we have alot of fun here without all the tryhards and "cheese of the week" games.

also, im not in bronze, im unranked, ranked is a horrible place
